info.name: paulwasit Habitica
info.description:
An extensive overhaul of the existing Habitica CSS. Its key features are:
- a more condensed look
- a flat design
- a revamped stats bar 
- a revamped display of all items
- plus many more small tweaks !

I hope you enjoy it as much as I enjoyed creating it !
info.additionalInfo:
2017/04/27 - v2.0.2: fix food-tray scrollbar 
2016/05/10 - v2.0.1: update padding for spells
2016/03/02 - v2.0.0: complete theme overhaul to fit the apps better / images now served through https

You can decide to include/exclude:

+ "move top/down" arrows 
+ task filters (all/weak/strong, all/due/grey, etc.)
+ tags
+ "add multiple" button
+ option boxes (help button & graphs for habits/dailies/tasks columns)
+ the footer
+ the "notes" icon
